name: 'The perfect mix', description: 'Each refill pack contains plenty of cards to last you a month of procrastination.', imageSrc: card, and brown someday card with dot grid.', }, { name: 'Refill packs', description: 'Subscribe and save on routine refill packs to keep you productive all year long.', imageSrc:
